response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to extend this offer to you at a price that reflects its true worth while allowing us both to benefit. I propose to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows for a reasonable profit margin for me. I believe this offer strikes a balance between value and affordability, making it an attractive proposition for both parties. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
